name: One Day I Found Myself Looking At Old Photos And It Was Weird

description:
One Day I Found Myself Looking At Old Photos And It Was Weird is a game developed by lucasograssi. It came out on 19-02-2021.
You can play One Day I Found Myself Looking At Old Photos And It Was Weird on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
